name: Connected Caves
description:
Created by

- Alexander Birke ( @AlexanderBirke )
- Sam Chester ( @SamChesterD )

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 30 jam

Fly your ship through procedurally generated caves, using portals to enter into new caves, ponder the nature of the world and your existence within it while making donuts with your engine exhaust, and shooting flares to make cool shadows dance among the crystal formations...

Controls

WASD - Directional thrust

Space / L Shift - Vertical thrust

Mouse - Turning

Left Mouse button - Fire Flare

Right Mouse button - hold to boost speed

Q - View current seed number & field to enter custom seed

Esc - Quit

Enjoy!

Music via Newgrounds Audio Portal - http://www.newgrounds.com/audio
- Anima Theory
- Anthony Floccari
- Xerferic
- Beaker E-Music
